subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Derrick Rose returned from a one-game absence to score 25 points and help the Chicago Bulls hold off a second-half charge and beat the Celtics, 88-79, in Boston on Friday night.
snippet: Derrick Rose returned from a one-game absence to score 25 points and help the Chicago Bulls hold off a second-half charge and beat the Celtics, 88-79, in Boston on Friday night.
